attributes.action: Do more for the environment and countries that need our help.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are some things which can't fix themselves-broken washing machines and age-old tellys; but there are more important things-like children, starving and diseased in Africa, and wasting energy that more needy people could be using.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
